onboardingText1: Explore a wide range of products
onboardingDescription1: Explore a wide range of products at your fingertips. QuickMart offers an extensive collection to suit your needs.
onboardingDescription2: Get access to limited-time deals and special promotions available only to our valued customers.
onboardingDescription3: QuickMart employs industry-leading encryption and trusted payment gateways to safeguard your financial information.
password_must_be_at_least_6_characters_l: Password must be at least 6 characters lon
privacy_policy: By login , you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.
enter_the_6-digit_verification: Enter the 6-digit verification code sent to your email address.
Enter_your_email_address_for_verificatio: Enter your email address for verification.
enter_your_new_password_and_remember_it: Enter your new password and remember it.
password_has_been_set_successfully: Congratulations! Your password has been set successfully. Please proceed to the login screen to verify your account.
